step_feedback.feedback: Great job stretching your arm overhead! Keep that arm straight and feel the resistance.
Excellent! You're opening your palm and fingers wide, which is key for this step.
Well done making a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles. This is exactly right.
Perfect! You're opening your hand while exhaling and relaxing. Keep visualizing that fluid moving.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and really focus on opening and closing your hand with your breath. This helps move fluid effectively.
